img_above_text:
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(72\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/31/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2872%29.png)
Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart.
img_below_text:
Hug the path to the left and continue along the lava, until you reach another tree to harvest a Fire Date and a statue on the right. Take the slope up and pick up the green Wisp from underneath the bridge directly opposite.
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(76\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/10/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2876%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(72\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/31/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2872%29.png)
Continue on the path to the left (running alongside the wall) to pick up the Fire Date from the tree on the right and take out the Bull Stalwart."
        - Following Text: "Hug the path to the left and continue along the lava, until you reach another tree to harvest a Fire Date and a statue on the right. Take the slope up and pick up the green Wisp from underneath the bridge directly opposite.
![Furnace Valley Walkthrough \(76\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/10/Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough_%2876%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a player-character navigating a volcanic environment with molten lava flows. A red arrow highlights the path forward, leading up a slope of lava, while a dashed circle marks an interactable or collectible object on the right. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's instructions to follow the path along the lava, harvest items, and progress toward the next area.
